name: TalkCRM

browser_action.default_title: Type commands in here to fill data in your CRM

content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://hooks.slack.com/* https://www.gstatic.com/ https://*.firebaseio.com https://www.googleapis.com https://api.hubapi.com; object-src 'self' https://hooks.slack.com/* https://api.hubapi.com; connect-src 'self' https://hooks.slack.com/ wss://*.firebaseio.com https://api.hubapi.com;
